plot: The Big Picture promotes all the latest movies hitting the cinemas over the coming month, plus individual Specials looking at Red Carpet Premieres, Press Conferences or Junkets. The Big Picture interviews the biggest names in Hollywood, including Tom Cruise, 'Daniel Craig' , Kirsten Dunst, Hugh Jackman, Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Daniel Radcliffe, John Hurt, Dominic Cooper, Benedict Cumberbatch, 'Tom Hardy' , 'Emma Stone' , Jamie Bell, Bill Nighy, Simon Pegg, 'Nick Frost' , Kathleen Kennedy, 'Kristin Scott-Thomas' and 'Madonna' among them.
title: The Big Picture
